fields.summary: Menu icons not visible in android

comments.body:
[~hardik_amal2007] can you please add more info to the ticket?
- Titanium SDK version
- Mobile OS Version
- Device details
- Test case
- Steps to reproduce the issue
Solved... i was writing Ti.Android.R.drawable.ic_action_search instead of Ti.App.Android.R.drawable.ic_action_search...you can close it
